description: a representation of an individual receiving services

name_full.title: Full Name
name_full.description: the full name of the Client as two seperate variables

bday.title: Birthdate
bday.description: alternate form of expressing and validating client's date of birth

sc_profile.title: Sociocultural Profile
sc_profile.description: Client's multi-dimensional, self-concept of their ethnicity, cultural heritage and race. Spectral intersections used to select Race/Ethnicity keywords

omb_ethnicity.title: OMB Ethnicity
omb_ethnicity.description: System selected OMB Ethnicity Keyword based on Client response

omb_race.title: OMB Race
omb_race.description: System selected OMB Race Keyword based on Client response

gs_profile.title: Gender/Sexual Profile
gs_profile.description: Client's multi-dimensional, self-concept of their gender and sexual orientation. Spectral intersections used to determine Gender/Sexual keywords (i.e. Gay/MSM, Lesbian, Transgender, Cisgendered, etc)

bio_sex.title: Biological Sex
bio_sex.description: the assigned sex of the Client of birth

gender_id.title: Gender Identity
gender_id.description: the currently identified gender of the Client

gender_exp.title: Gender Expression
gender_exp.description: Client's currently identified outward expression of their gender
